title: Fort Necessity National Battlefield: Historical & Environmental Education Reading
body: Historical & Environmental Education Reading          Results   Showing results 1-2 of 2    Sort By:  Title Date         Fort Necessity National Battlefield French and Indian War - Primary Documents and artifacts  Learn about 14 primary documents or artifacts that are featured on the biography cards in the teacher's education kit "The French and Indian War 1754-1763."  Each artifact or primary documents is pictured and has a brief history.  Click on the link in the "view" section to open the pdf document.    Grade level:Fourth Grade - Sixth Grade Subjects:French and Indian War        Fort Necessity National Battlefield The Lands Would be Entirely Theirs Again  This is a 24 page booklet about the American Indians in the Ohio River Valley during the French and Indian War that is FREE to all teachers.  Call 724-329-8124 to get your copy.    Publish Date: 2009  Grade level:Kindergarten - College Undergraduate Level Subjects:American Indian History and Culture, French and Indian War
